meanings.definition: Manipulated boundaries of an electoral constituency to favor one party or class.
meanings.sent1: The gerrymandered district ensured the victory of a specific political party.
meanings.sent2: The controversial gerrymandered map led to heated debates among politicians.
meanings.sent3: The gerrymandered borders made the election results seem fishy.
meanings.sent4: The gerrymandered lines twisted and turned like a confusing maze.
meanings.sent5: The gerrymandered district looked like a jigsaw puzzle put together haphazardly.

meanings.definition: Divided unfairly or dishonestly for political gain.
meanings.sent1: The gerrymandered districts favored certain groups over others.
meanings.sent2: The community protested against the gerrymandered voting districts.
meanings.sent3: The gerrymandered boundaries seemed to play tricks on the voters.
meanings.sent4: The gerrymandered decision left a bitter taste in the mouths of many.
meanings.sent5: The gerrymandered lines created an unjust advantage for a few individuals.
